game.title: Limbo
game.description: Limbo is a critically acclaimed puzzle-platformer set in a haunting black-and-white world. Play as a young boy searching for his sister through a dangerous and atmospheric environment filled with traps, puzzles, and eerie creatures. With its minimalist art style and immersive sound design, Limbo delivers a unique and unforgettable experience.

achievements.name: Trophies Coming Soon
achievements.description: Trophies for this game will be added in the future
